title: bassaholics font?
content:
Need to write customers name in the same font as bassaholics. Can anyone tell what font to use.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [bassaholics2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221705/http:/typophile.com/files/bassaholics2.png) | 7.49 KB |
author: P.I.

comments.content: This is a (horrible) free font called ‘Dark Crystal Script’.

Based on lettering in the movie of the same name.  
Don
THANK YOU SO much you guys are great!
